login-login.successDescriptionLogin:
You have successfully logged in!
Close this window to enter the game.
login-login.mailNotExists: Account with this E-mail does not exist
login-login.sendError: An error occurred while sending the letter. Try again later
login-login.passwordResetSuccess: A new password has been sent to your mail
login-login.mailSuccess: A letter with a verification code was sent to the specified E-mail
login-login.confirmationCodeNotExists: Verification code is outdated, get a new one

login-startup.nicknameLimit: Field "Nickname" can't be more than 20 symbols
login-startup.passwordLimit: Field "Nickname" can't be more than 32 symbols
login-startup.checkMail:
A welcome letter was also sent to your mail ^-^
Check the Spam folder if you cannot find it.
login-startup.successDescription:
Account #{{userId}} successfully created! Remember/save this number, it will be useful to you when you'll try to login.
{{mail}}To continue registration close this window.
login-startup.emailExists: An account with the specified E-mail is already registered

profile-index.lastActivityDataIsMissing: This user hasn't done anything notable recently!
profile-index.eventDataIsMissing: The user has not yet participated in the events :c

notice.REMOVED_FROM_FRIENDS: {{affectorName}} removed you from their friend list

noticemarquee.maintenanceNotice: In the period from {{startDay}} {{startTime}} to {{endDay}} {{endTime}} UTC{{timeZone}}, server will be unavailable due to maintenance

mailer.bodyWelcome:
Hey {{userName}}!

You received this email because your mail was indicated at registration on the private server for the game Love Live! School Idol Festival.

In the future, this email address mail will be used to notify and confirm actions associated with your account.

Thank You for playing! :ли
